summary:
A completely standalone
female Khajiit follower. UNP Body. and UUNP HDT
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84697-0-1497919347.jpg[/img]
[b][center][font=Georgia][color=#ea9999][size=5]THANK YOU!![/size][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia]
[size=2]If YOU like this mod then please [color=#ffe599]Endorse! [/color][/size]
[size=4][color=#ffe599]Endorse[/color] [/size][size=2]is It helps more than you might think![/size][/font][color=#ffe599]
[/color][/center][font=Georgia][size=2][center][color=#c27ba0][color=#d5a6bd][size=3]
Non HDT [/size]version[/color][/color] is run just fine in [color=#ffd966][size=3]Skyrim SE
[color=#ffffff][b][size=2][font=Tahoma]You can now use [/font][/size][size=2][font=Tahoma][color=#ff0000]ELCARUS for play with the Race menufragment import.[/color][/font][/size][size=2][font=Tahoma][color=#ffffff]And it will 10 new big eyes are added.
[/color][/font][/size][/b][/color][/size][/color][color=#ffd966][size=3][color=#ffffff][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84848/][font=Tahoma]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84848/[/font][/url][/color]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84697-0-1498379196.jpg[/img]

[/size][/color][b][font=Georgia][size=2][size=4]ADD option File[/size][size=6] [color=#ff0000]ELCARUS HDT CAPES![/color][/size][/size][/font][/b][b][font=Georgia][size=2]This Mod is [color=#ffd966][size=4]Capes with HDT physics by Krypt and Kallukoras  [/size][/color][/size][/font][/b][b][font=Georgia][size=2][color=#ffd966][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59700/ ]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59700/ [/url][/size][/color]Retexture and Modify...[/size][/font][/b][color=#ffd966][size=3]
[/size][/color][/center][/size][/font][/b][list]
[/list][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84697-0-1497881019.jpg[/img]
This Mod is[color=#ffd966][size=5] STANDALONE[/size][/color] which means 
no other Mods will be required.
[size=5][color=#ffd966]You can install her with no problems[/color]
[b][size=5][color=#f1c232]
ELCARUS [/color]
